name: 2D Platformer (Wiseman560)
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project

Modifications:

1) Create a slight puzzle element to the game's path finding, getting players to look closely at the environment, and possibly enemies and available items; this can be done by repurposing existing elements and adding some code to create more permanent obstacles

2) Create a level that tests the player's ability to discover a path through a complex enemy placement pattern, with some assistance from environment clues

3) Give players another way to interact with the environment besides jumping and touching; this should ideally aid the puzzle element of the game

Credits:

Created By Tariq Jones
